ygData.subject: Mask of Deception vs Ultravision update
ygData.msgSnippet: OK I ll try it one more time tonight and this time make sure to reactivate the illusion after I sing Psalm of Cooling/Warmth.  I always have one of these songs
ygData.messageBody:
OK I'll try it one more time tonight and this time make sure to reactivate
the illusion after I sing Psalm of Cooling/Warmth. I always have one of
these songs up when fighting the ogres so its possible that when night time
came that the Psalm had overridden the effect.

Galtin of E'ci

> >
> > So far everyone who has responded to my initial post (4 or 5 replies)
> has
> > been a half elf. It seems that half elves have no problem and get
> > ultravision when they activate the DE illusion. So far no wood elf with
> a
> > Mask has responded. So if you are a wood elf with the Mask of Deception
> > please let me know if you are able to get ultravision when you activate
> the
> > illusion.
>
> Hey, I responded. Wood elf, new mask, I get UV. The only
> time I've had it go away is due to the already mentioned
> problem with Psalm of Warmth/Cooling.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
